Title: Blind Alleys
Plot: Al and Carrie are forced to the sidelines by a negotiator when the father of a suspect that Roe shot takes members of the Queens PD, including Nina, hostage in a desperate quest for justice.
GuestStars: Clark Johnson, Boris McGiver, Anne Lange, Blanca Camacho, Scott Johnsen, Jasmine Carmichael, Stephen Tyrone Williams, Pablo Gonzalez, Matthew Sproul, Christopher Pena, Mateo Gomez, Alexis Suarez, Ann Sanders
